identity.name: DancyMeals
identity.purpose: Empower freelance cooks in Cameroon to run professional food businesses through branded websites
identity.problem: Cooks manage orders via WhatsApp (chaotic), collect cash payments (no records), have no online presence, cannot scale
identity.solution: Multi-tenant platform with branded websites, online ordering, mobile money payments, order tracking, analytics

workflows: Order: Browse > Select Components > Cart > Location > Pay > Track > Rate
Cook: Setup Wizard > Dashboard > Create Meals > Manage Orders > Withdraw
Admin: Create Tenant > Assign Cook > Monitor > Resolve Complaints > Payouts
Complaint: Client submits > Cook responds (24h) > Auto-escalate > Admin resolves
Payment: Client pays > Flutterwave processes > Webhook confirms > Cook wallet credited (unwithdrawable) > 3h timer > Withdrawable > Cook withdraws
integrations: Flutterwave v3 (MTN MoMo + Orange Money, split payments, transfers)

non_functional.security: Rate limiting, honeypot, tenant isolation, RBAC

user_decisions: Order flow: Fixed statuses (Pending Payment > Paid > Confirmed > Preparing > Ready > Out for Delivery/Ready for Pickup > Delivered/Picked Up > Completed) + Cancelled + Refunded
Cancellation: Cook-configurable time window with full refund to wallet
Complaints: Tiered with auto-rules (categorized > cook responds 24h > auto-escalate > admin arbitrates)
Analytics: Comprehensive with CSV/PDF exports for all roles
Favorites: Full system (favorite cooks, meals, reorder from history)
Cook landing: Rich brand page (bio, carousel, meals, ratings, testimonials, schedule, areas, social)
Testimonials: Separate from ratings, cook approves display
Email notifications: Push + DB + Email (3 channels)
User profile: Essential fields (name, email, phone, photo, language, addresses, payment methods)
Cook onboarding: Guided step-by-step setup wizard
Messaging: Basic in-app per-order message thread
Prep time: Estimated preparation time per meal
Future scheduling: Allow clients to schedule orders for future dates
